steps.text: Cut the cabbage and separate the cabbage into the leaf and root pieces and slice the mushroom. The suggested piece for the cabbage is half an inch per piece.
Add oil to the wok. Turn the flame to high and wait until the oil is mostly heated
Pour the root pieces of the cabbage into the wok
Add salt to the cabbage in the wok and stir for 30 seconds
Pour the leave pieces of cabbage and mushroom into the wok
Add lesser salt than before onto the leaves in the wok
Stir and mix the cabbage and mushroom in the wok
Let the ingredients in the wok settle down for 2 minutes. This is to let the cabbage and mushroom soften
Flip the ingredients and wait for 1 minute
Add a little bit of chicken powder. If the taste is not strong enough, add salt.
Take out the cabbage and pour it into the dish.
